Room.Name: Delegation Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Delegation Way, east of the Hofton Ziggurat.
Room.LongDescription: The Hofton Ziggurat is one of the largest structures in the city of Oceancrest, and acts as the foreign affairs office for the city. The Lyanden Castle, just to the south in the center of Lyanden Lake, is used primarily by heads-of-state, whereas the Ziggurat is used by all the foreign ministers for general policy making.
